name: Whispers of Dawn
author: Elena Morrelli
description: Soft hues of pink and gold capturing the fragile silence just before sunrise.

name: The Silent Horizon
author: Kenji Sato
description: A vast seascape where sky and water dissolve into one endless line.

name: Fragments of Memory
author: Amira Khalid
description: Abstract shapes and muted tones evoking the way memories blur and overlap.

name: Velvet Storm
author: Victor Hansen
description: Deep indigos and purples swirling together, like a tempest wrapped in luxury.

name: Echoes in Blue
author: Sofia Delgado
description: A study in layered blues, where color feels like sound reverberating through space.

name: Shadows of Serenity
author: Jonas Eberhardt
description: Tranquil greens and grays, with delicate light filtering through still trees.

name: The Garden of Forgotten Dreams
author: Nadia Petrescu
description: Surreal blossoms and winding paths suggesting a place both inviting and lost.

name: Amber Stillness
author: Louis Carriere
description: Golden light captured in a frozen moment, like dusk preserved in glass.

name: When the Sky Breathed
author: Aisha Rahman
description: Dramatic brushstrokes of clouds unfolding as if the heavens themselves exhaled.

name: Ephemeral Light
author: Matteo Rinaldi
description: A fleeting glow illuminating the canvas, celebrating beauty that vanishes in an instant.
